topic.title: Attaching Mail Merge Documents to a Record of a Form

othermeta.name: title
othermeta.content: Attaching Mail Merge Documents to a Record of a Form

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Mail merge documents configured for a form can be attached to individual records and made available in the attachments section.

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: attach mail merge documents to records

ul.li:
Mail merge is configured for the selected form.
For additional information, refer to Configuring Mail Merge.
You are invited to the project and provided with the Edit permission.

body.context: You can attach a mail merge document to a specific record of a form.

li.p: On the required list page of a form, select a record for which the notification has to be attached.
Click Mail Merge, and then click Merge and Attach.
The Merge and Attach dialog box is displayed.
From the Mail Merge Configuration drop-down list, select the required configuration.
Available options are all the configurations associated with the form. For additional information, refer to Configuring Mail Merge.
To convert the mail merge document to PDF, select the Convert to PDF check box. If the check box is cleared, then the mail merge document is attached in the Word format.

p.note: If the Convert to PDF check box is selected at the time when the mail merge is configured, then this check box is selected. Clear the check box to attach the mail merge document in PDF format.

li.p: The mail merge document is attached to the record and available in the ATTACHMENTS section of the record.
